transcript:
Customer: Sir, hello.
Executive: Hello, ha Shivaji bataiye Ishan baat kar raha hu aapka account manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji, mai aapko dusre number pe call kar sakta hu?
Executive: Sir kar sakte hai but ye office ka number hai ispe mujhe aap mujhe aap se baat karni padegi bataiye kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ye humne category me clay modifier matlab profile bhi puri 100 out of 100 score ja rahi hai.
Executive: Shivaji pehle mai aap se thodi baat karna chahunga dekho aapka kuch bhi concern ho aapke pass mera number hai aap mere personal number pe sir call kar liya karo hota kya hai na aap office wale number pe call karte ho IndiaMART ke to yaha aapke uske against aapke concerns ke liye ek ticket raise jaati hai ab ticket raise hota hai to lagta hai ki koi bahut heavy concern hai sir ko bahut jyada dikkat ho rahi hai to wo ek negative impact apni profile pe padta hai samjhiega mai aapke fayde ki baat kar raha hu aapko chhoti si bhi dikkat hai aap mujhe personal number pe call karo mai 247 available hu aapke aapke account handling ke liye aapki services ke liye to jab bhi jaise aap sham me karte ho kabhi kabhar mai dusri call utha nahi pata but mai aapko call back zarur kar leta hu aisa nahi hota ki meri aap se baat na ho right to ab hota kya hai basically jaise aapne IndiaMART pe concern raise kiya to sir ekdum ticket open ho jati hai aur fir wo teen char din tak agar usme hum feedback nahi le to lagta hai ki bahut koi bada matter hai jo ki nahi hota to mera aap se request yahi rahega ki aap mujhe personally connect kar liya karo right ab jo aap theek hai koi dikkat to nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi ye abhi aise hi kya tha ye leads ko leke.
Executive: Mai samajh gaya tha bilkul aapki meri baat bhi hui thi aur uske baad leads vagaira ki baat karni thi ki aapne product bhi add kiye mai aapki profile pe hi kaam kar raha tha maine dekh liya aapne do products add kare hai bahut achcha laga mujhe dekh kar uske baad aapne jo concern raise kiya hai wo ye keh kar kiya hai ki aapko physical meeting kuch chahiye kya issue face ho raha hai physical meeting kind of what?
Customer: Aise kuch bola tha aapne physical meeting kya hai sir bataiye?
Executive: Yaha pe aap nahi yaha pe aapne video meeting ke liye kya concern raise kari thi ki mujhe video meet pe discuss karna hai aisa kuch?
Customer: Bhai mai chahta tha koi manager matlab aisa mai ghar par aake samjha sake aisa nahi ho sakta hai kya?
Executive: Sir field field person to abhi available nahi hai apne pass but ye hai ki mai aap se pura time video meet pe connect reh sakta hu achche se ek ek cheeze mai baitha hu sir kya dikkat hai aapko field person ki kya zarurat hai mai equally mai equally what you say field person ke barabar hi ho aapko jo cheeze puchni hai mai aapke sare doubts yahi se clear kar dunga to requirement apni hone hona nahi chahiye.
Customer: Ha to aap isi ka bataiye mere ko maine matlab wo product to sab sahi set kar diya tha matlab ab kya dikkat aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Ha lead generate ho hi nahi rahi hai clay modifier ki kahi bricks ki aa rahi hai kahi tiles ki aa rahi hai kahi cement ki aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ek second maine aapka profile khol liya ek second bas ek second rukiye.

Executive: To lead abhi bhi apne pass concern apna yahi hai ki apne ko abhi bhi bricks ki mil rahi hai aisa na?
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Bricks ke alava koi nahi mil rahi yahi keh rahe ho na clay modifier ke alava koi mile hi nahi rahi bas ek abhi aayi hai kal do din ho gaya do din se aayi nahi thi apne ko konsi buylead chahiye mai dekh pa raha hu aapne clay modifier ke do products aur add kare hai 20l aur clay modifier ke right hindi me bhi kiye english me bhi kiye do hindi me kiye right mujhe dekh ke achcha laga ab ispe agar apan buylead expect karte hai to konsi expect karte hai kya apne ko buylead me kya chahiye clay modifier chahiye.
Customer: Clay modifier chahiye.
Executive: Clay modifier ke alava kya chahiye humko clay modifier nahi chahiye to kya chahiye?
Customer: Clay modifier chahiye bolna.
Executive: Clay modifier hi ki chahiye bas to clay modifier ki sir available hai na apne pass dekho na IndiaMART pe buylead show ho rahi hai.
Customer: Sirf ek hi hai abhi do din se aa hi nahi rahi thi abhi aaj aayi hai bas.
Executive: 10 minute pehle aayi hai yahi ki baat kar rahe ho na Warangal Telangana ki right 5 liter.
Customer: Ha aaj aayi hai nahi to do din se aa hi nahi rahi thi.
Executive: Achcha ek baat batao aapne apna product kab add jo do products aapne badhaye wo kab badhaye the kal badhaye the parso badhaye the?
Customer: Saturday ko.
Executive: Ab ab ab meri baat samajhna Saturday ke Sunday IndiaMART ke headquarters office bilkul close rehta hai aapki profile pe kuch bhi kaam nahi hua tha do din aapne sab apna add kar diya product apne apna add kar diya aaj Monday hua hai office operational hua hai work services aapki working hui hai jaise hi AI ne aapka product detect kiya aapke pass buylead aana start ho gayi do din ka sir time lagta hai aapne Saturday ko dal diya tha aapko pata hai pura IT IT sector tak Sunday off rehta hai right kuch bhi operation nahi ho raha unka services off rehti hai jaise hi Monday aaya aapke product ko detect kiya aapke pass ab buylead aana start ho gayi 10 minute pehle aayi hai ab aapke pass ye loop chalta rahega till the till the very further time jab tak aapki services live hai ek saal tak jo bhi aapne package liya hai right ye matlab extra product add kare wo pehle wale product ko matlab thoda sa alag image dal diya kya ye karna sahi hai ki nahi hai matlab purane wale me image change karke bhi koi fayda karna chaho kar do Shivaji aisi koi baat nahi ki purane image me ha thoda sa differentiation arise ho jayega differentiation matlab ki har ek product me aapki photo ka color same hai blue blue blue blue agar blue ki jagah koi dusri photo dal do to ek achchi value add ho jayegi hamare products me theek hai ek differentiation ho jayega ki wahi hai sir matlab hamare pass koi dikkat nahi hai maine ko aapko kaha hi nahi ki aap photo change karo aapne mujhse pucha to mai aapko keh raha hu ki karna chaho kar do varna nahi bhi karoge to koi dikkat nahi hai aapka clay modifier concern tha aapke pass buylead aana start ho gayi abhi ek aayi hai aaram se wait and watch karo do din teen din ab aapka jo algorithm hai usme IndiaMART ke AI ne sense kiya hai ab aapke pass clay modifier ki buylead post hona start ho jayegi kyuki aapne product apna add kar diya hai wo delay isliye hua kyuki aapne weekend pe kiya tha yahi aap agar Monday se leke Friday ke beech me karte jab services aapki available rehti hai office chal raha hota hai to quick response milta humko hume quick response kyu nahi mila kyuki apan ne weekend pe kiya tha to aapko isliye laga ki mujhe nahi aa rahi hai wo jo ki concern aapka raise hai to isliye maine aap se kaha agar aap mujhse personally phone karke puch lete Saturday ko bhi aapka phone mai utha hi leta to mai aapko bata deta befikar raho Monday se aapke pass aana shuru ho jayegi jo ki aana start ho gayi hai to ye type naye naye jab apan join karte hai usme apna concern rehta hai which is which is which is very honest which is very natural baat hai koi dikkat nahi hai isme to ab ye 10 minute pehle aapke pass aayi hai aap isko start karo lena isme inquiry karo inse baat baat karo.
Customer: Inko 10 ke chahiye matlab hai na.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul abhi aur aana start hogi isko apna business shuru hua hai sir chhoti chhoti cheezo se lekar hi bade banenge apan to apne ko pehle chhoti chhoti buylead consume karenge tabhi hum badi le payenge right to ek baar chhote order uthana shuru karo badi jaise hi aana start hogi mai baitha hu mai screenshot bhej dunga Shivaji aa gayi hai utha lo kyuki kabhi kabhar aisa hota hai aap nahi ho rahi hai to mujhe koi samajh me aayi to maine aapko screenshot bhej diya whatsapp pe theek hai aapne uthai baat kar li ab dheeme dheeme ek se mature kari do se kari teen se kari hafte me agar aap 10 buylead ko utha lete ho koi na koi to mature hogi kahi na kisi na kisi se koi business aayega 10 me se ek me se koi buyer hoga jo aap se business karna chahega right baki depend karta hai ki aap unse kaise deal karte ho kya price dete ho unko theek hai to abhi ek buylead aayi hai ise purchase karo baat karo inse banao apna business jaan pehchan banao kyuki hota ye hai ki online me sabse bada funda yahi hai ki na aap buyer ko jante ho na buyer aapko janta hai to contact nahi ho pata properly matlab wo ek trust factor hota hai na honesty wala to apan ki jaan pehchan jab nahi hoti to dealing karne me pehle apan ek dusre ko pehchante hai baat karte hai samajhte hai fir dealing ho paati hai to sara khel online me buylead purchase karke baat karne ka hai calls pe jaise aapne usko apna bana liya buyer ko deal aapki hai ye jo matlab abhi lead hai Telangana side ki 5 liter ki ha inki order quantity 5 liter hai usse kam me matlab hote hai minimum 20 liter se starting hai hamara product ka baat karke dekho puchho lead lena chahiye humko ki nahi lena chahiye mai samajh ye aap le lo dekho puchho hota kya hai kuch buyers aise hote hai jo sample lead dete hai sample matlab pehle sample hi lete hai ki pehle aage ho ab ye Telangana se hai aap ho idhar se ab itna lamba distance hai buyer janta nahi hai ekdum bulk order kaise de de pehle trust banayega na aap se aapko pehchanega to kabhi kabhar hota kya hai buyer sample order de deta hai sample requirement ki pehle test karke dekh leta hu ki mai jisse baat kar raha hu wo mujhe maal provide kar bhi payega ki nahi kar payega agar mai apni bhasha me baat karu to wo maal mujhe kaisa aayega quality kaise rahegi to ek baar unse baat karo puchho ki 5 liter aapki exact quantity hai ki aapko aur bhi chahiye baat banti hai aur ye ek baar sample aapko test kar lega isko sample order de do uske baad further agar ye aur jyada quantity me deal karne ke liye ready ho jata hai to usko aur provide kar dena bulk me kyuki abhi isne chhoti quantity ki yaha pe post kari hai ho sakta hai ye bulk me deal karna chahta ho but just because ki online me kisi ko pehchanta nahi hai isliye isne minimum quantity yaha pe post kari hai apne so aur ye jo humne product description add kara hai usme english bhi likha hai aur humne hindi bhi likha hai to usse koi aisa nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi hai mere ko bahut achcha laga ki aapne english hindi dono mix kiya maine socha tha hindi kar dunga asani hoti hai na matlab asani hoti hai bilkul ye bahut achcha kiya ki aapne dono mix kar di ha aur bilkul isme aur to kuch nahi hai matlab bilkul aur jo buylead aap purchase karo wo lead manager pe aayegi aapke pass unse contact karna chat karke dekhna quotation bhejna puchna ki sir 5 liter to mai aapko de dunga shuruwat me baad me apni kitni quantity ho sakti hai unse pehle puchna unka use case kya hai business hai unka bhi ya wo kis liye le rahe hai uske hisab se agar buyer ko aap guide karoge na uske real requirement ke hisab se to wo aap se achche se connect karega samajh rahe ho pehle uska concern samajhna puchna ki zarurat 5 liter ki kya hai wo kis liye le raha hai agar wo galat le raha hai aur usko lagta hai aapko ki ye quantity galat hai iska kaam bada hai to usko jyada prefer karna ki sir recommend karna ki sir jyada lo aap aur is rate pe mai aapko de dunga jo bhi best price available karate ho usko ki quality hamari achchi hai aise aise tab aapka connection aur contact hoga buyer se to sara khel baat ka hai samajh gaye ho na aap ha aur agar aisa aap jo bata rahe ho mujhe lead ka matlab aap jo aise order aayega agar mai dhyan nahi deta hu to aap mujhe whatsapp me bhej denge screenshot bilkul bilkul screenshot bhej dunga kabhi kabhar aisa hota hai ki aap available nahi ho aapne mujhe bas hi karke bhej diya Ishan ji mai aaj busy hu mujhe lead provide kar dena to mai jaldi free hounga mai aapko whatsapp kar dunga screenshot mujhe whatsapp chhod diya karna mere ko pata hai filhal ke liye jo aaj buylead aayi hui hai us pe aap jao contact buy now pe click karo ya fir mai video call pe aapko video call pe aaoge kuch discuss karna hai to batao video call se mai aapko connect karu mujhe kehna chahta hu lead ko contact hi kar le time waste karne ka koi matlab nahi aur log bhi karne ke liye bilkul bilkul aur log bhi karne ke liye inse baat karo theek hai apna concern vagaira raise karo inse puchho ye profile jo banaya product vagaira ab to sahi hai na matlab kuch aisi bilkul theek hai nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi hai future ek second mai dekh leta hu future me agar aapko koi aur bhi product add karna hoga to mujhe bata dena ha bilkul aapka are wah aapka 90 score hai bahut badhiya badhiya lag dekh ke badhiya theek ji bilkul theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai QS aapka 90 hai bilkul tarike se buylead milegi bas patience rakho aur wait karo cheezo ka aaram se aapko buylead aana start ho jayegi ji pehli wish shri Ganesh kar do kuch na kuch response milega hi milega ha theek hai baki koi concern hoga mujhe connect kar sakte ho mere personal number pe aap connect kar lena aapko personal number pe karunga office wale pe mat karna bilkul aur dusra mai puch raha tha jo aapki ticket yaha pe raise hui hai mai use close kar du apne end se koi aur doubt to nahi hai apna abhi nahi nahi ab kuch nahi bilkul mai use close kar deta hu theek hai sir ji ji all right okay have a nice day thanks
summary:
Concerns:

- Profile score is 100/100, but getting wrong leads.

- Wants physical meeting with a manager.

- Leads are not generating for clay modifier.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process of raising concerns.

- Executive offered to connect via video call.

- Executive clarified the reason for lead generation delay.

- Executive explained the importance of building trust.

- Executive explained how to handle the new buylead.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact the new buylead.

- Executive will close the raised ticket.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, profile, products, meeting
